Ingredients.4: 1 (1.06 ounce) package mojito lime marinade mix

Ingredients.5: 2 pounds raw jumbo shrimp, shelled and deveined

Directions.1: Combine oil, vinegar, water, and marinade mix in a large bowl. Add shrimp and marinate for 30 minutes.

Directions.2: Preheat the grill to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C) and oil the grate with cooking spray.

Directions.3: Add onions to the hot grill, keeping rings intact. Add bell peppers. Grill for 3 to 5 minutes per side. Transfer to a cutting board and chop roughly.

Directions.4: Grill shrimp until opaque and cooked through, 1 to 2 minutes per side. Transfer shrimp to a bowl covered with aluminum foil to keep warm.

Directions.5: Heat tortillas on the hot grill for 1 to 2 minutes. Assemble fajitas with onion, peppers, and 3 to 4 shrimp per tortilla.
